action_detail.name: blackout_kick
action_detail.description:
Kick with a blast of Chi energy, dealing ${7.12*$<low>} to ${7.12*$<high>} Physical damage$?s116645&a115070[ to your target and ${3.56*$<low>} to ${3.56*$<high>} to up to $116645s4 additional nearby targets][].$?s128595[
If behind the target, you deal an additional $m2% damage over $128531d. If in front of the target, you are instantly healed for $m2% of the damage done.][] $?s117967[
Also causes you to gain Shuffle, increasing your parry chance by $115307s1% and your Stagger amount by an additional $115307s2% for $115307d.][]$?s116645[
Also empowers you with Serpent's Zeal, causing you and your summoned Jade Serpent Statue to heal nearby injured targets equal to $127722m1% of your auto-attack damage.][]

action_detail.name: chi_brew
action_detail.description: Instantly restores all of your Chi.

action_detail.name: jab
action_detail.description: You Jab the target, dealing ${1.5*$<low>} to ${1.5*$<high>} damage and generating $s2 Chi.

action_detail.name: mana_tea
action_detail.description: Restores $m1% of your maximum mana per stack of Mana Tea active. Mana Tea must be channeled, lasting $t1 sec per stack. Cancelling the channel will not waste stacks.

action_detail.name: stormlash
action_detail.description: Deals Nature damage to enemy targets.

action_detail.name: tiger_palm
action_detail.description:
Attack with the palm of your hand, dealing $?s116645[${6*$<low>} to ${6*$<high>}][${3*$<low>} to ${3*$<high>}] damage.
Also grants you Tiger Power, causing your attacks to ignore $125359m1% of enemies' armor for $125359d.
